Name: ID
Description: Uniquely identifies this as a SunSpec Meter Modbus Map (float); 211: single phase, 212: split phase, 213: three phase

Name: VAphA
Description: AC Apparent Power Phase A value

Name: VAphB
Description: AC Apparent Power Phase B value

Name: VAphC
Description: AC Apparent Power Phase C value

Name: VARphA
Description: AC Reactive Power Phase A value

Name: VARphB
Description: AC Reactive Power Phase B value

Name: VARphC
Description: AC Reactive Power Phase C value

Name: TotVArhImpQ1phA
Description: Total VAR-hours Imported Q1 phase A

Name: TotVArhImpQ1phB
Description: Total VAR-hours Imported Q1 phase B

Name: TotVArhImpQ1phC
Description: Total VAR-hours Imported Q1 phase C

Name: TotVArhImpQ2phA
Description: Total VAR-hours Imported Q2 phase A

Name: TotVArhImpQ2phB
Description: Total VAR-hours Imported Q2 phase B

Name: TotVArhImpQ2phC
Description: Total VAR-hours Imported Q2 phase C

Name: TotVArhExpQ3phA
Description: Total VAR-hours Exported Q3 phase A

Name: TotVArhExpQ3phB
Description: Total VAR-hours Exported Q3 phase B

Name: TotVArhExpQ3phC
Description: Total VAR-hours Exported Q3 phase C

Name: TotVArhExpQ4phA
Description: Total VAR-hours Exported Q4 phase A

Name: TotVArhExpQ4phB
Description: Total VAR-hours Exported Q4 phase B

Name: TotVArhExpQ4phC
Description: Total VAR-hours Exported Q4 phase C
